scripts.release: tsc && xcopy src\libs dist\libs /s /y /d && xcopy src\widget dist\widget /s /y /d && xcopy src\components dist\components /s /y /d && copy src\*.d.ts dist\ && npm publish --registry=https://packages.aliyun.com/6213a37673741507cb7dec1f/npm/npm-registry/
scripts.release:dev: tsc && xcopy src\widget dist\widget /s /y /d && xcopy src\components dist\components /s /y /d && copy src\*.d.ts dist\ && npm publish --registry=https://repo.bingosoft.net/repository/npm-snapshot/
